languages.text: {n}Хрупкая фигура, более похожая на отголосок живого человека, испуганно озирается по сторонам. Спутанные волосы всклокоченным облаком окутывают осунувшееся лицо Кассии, а дрожащие руки поспешно размазывают кровавую слезу по щеке.{/n} "{name}, какое облегчение вновь говорить с вами. Во тьме сего места ваша душа сияет подобно золоту солнца".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хрупкая фигура, более похожая на отголосок живого человека, испуганно озирается по сторонам. Спутанные волосы всклокоченным облаком окутывают осунувшееся лицо Кассии, а дрожащие руки поспешно размазывают кровавую слезу по щеке.{/n} "{name}, какое облегчение вновь говорить с вами. Во тьме сего места ваша душа сияет подобно золоту солнца".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}A frail figure, more like an echo of a living human, looks around in dismay. Cassia's dishevelled hair is like a shaggy cloud around her haggard face. Her hands tremble as she hurries to smudge a bloody tear on her cheek.{/n} "What a relief to be talking to you again, {name}. Your soul shines like the gold of the sun in the darkness of this place."
languages.original_text: {n}Хрупкая фигура, более похожая на отголосок живого человека, испуганно озирается по сторонам. Во тьме сего места ваша душа сияет подобно золоту солнца".

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅虚弱的身影正担忧地看着周围的景象，看起来就像是活人留下的回声。她凌乱的头发仿佛蓬松的云朵一样，围绕在她憔悴的脸周围。她双手颤抖着，急匆匆地抹掉了沾在脸颊上的一滴血泪。{/n}“能再次与你交谈，真是让人宽慰不已，{name}。在这片黑暗之中，你的灵魂就像太阳的金色光芒一样耀眼。”
languages.original_text: {n}A frail figure, more like an echo of a living human, looks around in dismay. Cassia's dishevelled hair is like a shaggy cloud around her haggard face. Her hands tremble as she hurries to smudge a bloody tear on her cheek.{/n} "What a relief to be talking to you again, {name}. Your soul shines like the gold of the sun in the darkness of this place."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅虚弱的身影正担忧地看着周围的景象，看起来就像是活人留下的回声。她凌乱的头发仿佛蓬松的云朵一样，围绕在她憔悴的脸周围。她双手颤抖着，急匆匆地抹掉了沾在脸颊上的一滴血泪。{/n}“能再次与你交谈，真是让人宽慰不已，{name}。在这片黑暗之中，你的灵魂就像太阳的金色光芒一样耀眼。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}A frail figure, more like an echo of a living human, looks around in dismay. Cassia's dishevelled hair is like a shaggy cloud around her haggard face. Her hands tremble as she hurries to smudge a bloody tear on her cheek.{/n} "What a relief to be talking to you again, . Your soul shines like the gold of the sun in the darkness of this place."

languages.text: {n}Una figura frágil, más bien un eco de una persona viva, mira a su alrededor presa de la consternación. La melena desaliñada de Cassia es como una nube peluda en torno a su ajada cara. Sus manos tiemblan e intenta secarse una lágrima de sangre en la mejilla.{/n} «Es un alivio volver a hablar con usted, {name}. Su alma es un resplandor dorado como el sol en medio de toda esta oscuridad».
languages.original_text: {n}A frail figure, more like an echo of a living human, looks around in dismay. Cassia's dishevelled hair is like a shaggy cloud around her haggard face. Her hands tremble as she hurries to smudge a bloody tear on her cheek.{/n} "What a relief to be talking to you again, {name}. Your soul shines like the gold of the sun in the darkness of this place."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una figura frágil, más bien un eco de una persona viva, mira a su alrededor presa de la consternación. La melena desaliñada de Cassia es como una nube peluda en torno a su ajada cara. Sus manos tiemblan e intenta secarse una lágrima de sangre en la mejilla.{/n} «Es un alivio volver a hablar con usted, {name}. Su alma es un resplandor dorado como el sol en medio de toda esta oscuridad».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}まるで生きている人間の残響のような、か弱い人影が呆然と辺りを見回している。カシアの乱れた髪が、ぼさぼさの雲のように彼女の憔悴しきった顔の周りを取り囲んでいる。頬に流れた血の涙を滲ませ、その手は震えている。{/n}「またあなたと話せて安心しました、{name}。この暗闇の中で、あなたの魂は太陽の黄金のように輝いています」
languages.original_text: {n}A frail figure, more like an echo of a living human, looks around in dismay. Cassia's dishevelled hair is like a shaggy cloud around her haggard face. Her hands tremble as she hurries to smudge a bloody tear on her cheek.{/n} "What a relief to be talking to you again, {name}. Your soul shines like the gold of the sun in the darkness of this place."

traits.locale_text: {n}まるで生きている人間の残響のような、か弱い人影が呆然と辺りを見回している。カシアの乱れた髪が、ぼさぼさの雲のように彼女の憔悴しきった顔の周りを取り囲んでいる。頬に流れた血の涙を滲ませ、その手は震えている。{/n}「またあなたと話せて安心しました、{name}。この暗闇の中で、あなたの魂は太陽の黄金のように輝いています」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Eine zerbrechliche Gestalt, eher ein Echo eines lebenden Menschen, blickt sich bestürzt um. Cassias zerzauste Haare hängen wie eine zottelige Wolke um ihr ausgemergeltes Gesicht. Sie wischt sich mit zittrigen Händen eilig eine blutige Träne von der Wange.{/n} "Ich bin so erleichtert, wieder mit Euch zu sprechen, {name}. Eure Seele strahlt an diesem dunklen Ort wie das Gold der Sonne."
languages.original_text: {n}A frail figure, more like an echo of a living human, looks around in dismay. Cassia's dishevelled hair is like a shaggy cloud around her haggard face. Her hands tremble as she hurries to smudge a bloody tear on her cheek.{/n} "What a relief to be talking to you again, {name}. Your soul shines like the gold of the sun in the darkness of this place."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine zerbrechliche Gestalt, eher ein Echo eines lebenden Menschen, blickt sich bestürzt um. Cassias zerzauste Haare hängen wie eine zottelige Wolke um ihr ausgemergeltes Gesicht. Sie wischt sich mit zittrigen Händen eilig eine blutige Träne von der Wange.{/n} "Ich bin so erleichtert, wieder mit Euch zu sprechen, {name}. Eure Seele strahlt an diesem dunklen Ort wie das Gold der Sonne."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Une frêle silhouette, qui vous fait plus penser à l'écho d'un être humain qu'autre chose, jette des regards frénétiques aux alentours, visiblement en plein désarroi. Les cheveux ébouriffés de Cassia forment un nuage hirsute autour de son visage aux traits tirés par la fatigue. Elle s'empresse d'essuyer d'une main tremblante une larme de sang qui coulait sur sa joue.{/n} « Quel soulagement de vous voir, {name}. Votre âme illumine cet endroit sinistre tel un soleil doré. »
languages.original_text: {n}A frail figure, more like an echo of a living human, looks around in dismay. Cassia's dishevelled hair is like a shaggy cloud around her haggard face. Her hands tremble as she hurries to smudge a bloody tear on her cheek.{/n} "What a relief to be talking to you again, {name}. Your soul shines like the gold of the sun in the darkness of this place."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une frêle silhouette, qui vous fait plus penser à l'écho d'un être humain qu'autre chose, jette des regards frénétiques aux alentours, visiblement en plein désarroi. Les cheveux ébouriffés de Cassia forment un nuage hirsute autour de son visage aux traits tirés par la fatigue. Elle s'empresse d'essuyer d'une main tremblante une larme de sang qui coulait sur sa joue.{/n} « Quel soulagement de vous voir, {name}. Votre âme illumine cet endroit sinistre tel un soleil doré. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}İnsandan ziyade bir yankıyı andıran çelimsiz suret, dehşet içinde etrafına bakınıyor. Cassia'nın dağınık saçı, bezgin yüzünün etrafını kabarık bir bulut misali sarmış. Yanağındaki kanla karışık gözyaşını telaşla silerken elleri titriyor.{/n} "Yeniden seninle konuşunca içime ferahlık geldi {name}. Ruhunun altın ışıltısıyla bu karanlığın ortasında güneş gibi doğdun."
languages.original_text: {n}A frail figure, more like an echo of a living human, looks around in dismay. Cassia's dishevelled hair is like a shaggy cloud around her haggard face. Her hands tremble as she hurries to smudge a bloody tear on her cheek.{/n} "What a relief to be talking to you again, {name}. Your soul shines like the gold of the sun in the darkness of this place."

traits.locale_text: {n}İnsandan ziyade bir yankıyı andıran çelimsiz suret, dehşet içinde etrafına bakınıyor. Cassia'nın dağınık saçı, kabarık bir bulut misali bezgin yüzünün etrafını sarmış. Yanağındaki kanla karışık gözyaşını telaşla silerken elleri titriyor.{/n} "Yeniden seninle konuşunca içime ferahlık geldi {name}. Ruhunun altın ışıltısıyla bu karanlığın ortasında güneş gibi doğdun."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
